name: Recurship
description:
Recurship is a Shoot 'em up where you collaborate with the ghosts of your past failures to overcome the odds.

You can move with WASD or the arrow keys. Attacking is automatic.
Use Enter to change fullscreen and Esc to quit.

Team Members
Programing  by William Ritson and Jenna Whilden 

Gameplay and Menu Music by Daniel Sabsay

 Additional Art and Design by Levi Geller

Resources Used
Space Shooter Env (Free) by Dinv Sudios
Space Shooter Extended by Kenny
Universal Sound FX by Imphenzia
Ultimate Game Music Collection by John Leonard French
Rebel Rapture Music Pack by Murray Atkinson

Created during the 2018 CPGD game jam.
